column2: ยงY[From.GetFirstName]ยง! might be pleased with you.
Languishing in the dungeon, you have recently made a new friend. It's a small, scruffy rat that keeps coming up to you and cuddling up in your lap.

Languishing in my dungeon, one night I suddenly wake up with a cold feeling of apprehension. As I stare into the darkness, a hissing, evil voice speaks to me: 'I am the Dread King of Darkness. This dungeon is my realm, and I demand that you serve me.'.

Late one night, the Dread King of Darkness appears to me again: 'Servant! You must find me the three dark stones of sorcery. They have been stolen from me and hidden in this dungeon. Know that I do not abide failure!'
Eventually, I managed to recover the three dark stones of sorcery for the Dread King of Darkness. They only look like three ordinary little stones, but surely the King will be pleased.
I never managed to recover the three dark stones of sorcery. I now fear that the Dread King of Darkness will come and punish me for my failure.
My war with the Dread King of Darkness has begun. Every night he sends his legions of ghosts and shadows to assault me.
In my valiant nightly battles against the Dread King of Darkness, I have finally reached the tipping point and forced my enemy to his knees.
I am exhausted from my nightly battles with the Dread King of Darkness, yet he is steadily advancing against me. It seems that the time for surrender has come.
Languishing in the dungeon, I have realized that there is someone in the cell next to me. I can hear [event_ze_12230_prisoner.GetHerHim] sighing, coughing and complaining sometimes.
It turns out that my fellow prisoner's name is [From.GetTitledName]. We have had many whispered conversations in the darkness, quickly becoming friends under these dismal circumstances.
My attemps to make contact with the other prisoner were met only with silence.
I've come across [haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick] kissing one of the servant folk in a hallway.
As I'm spending a pleasant moment alone with the attractive cook, the wretched child [From.GetFirstName] comes upon us and promptly starts chiding me about morals!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] didn't take kindly to my chiding. [From.GetSheHeCap] caught me and gave me a good beating.
[From.GetFirstName], the [GetRootFromInsult], went around and told everyone lies about me, as childish revenge for the deserved beating I gave [From.GetHerHim].
I have seen [affectionate_events_char_1.GetFirstName] looking at my new wooden toy animals.
[From.GetFirstName] has much nicer toys than me, and [From.GetSheHe] asked me if I want to play with them.
[From.GetFirstName] and me played all day with my toys.
[From.GetFirstName] let me play with [From.GetHerHis] toys all day and it was so much fun.

I saw [timid_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName] being chided publicly for stealing food from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle], but I know [timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe] was elsewhere at the time.

I was wrongfully accused of stealing fine foods from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]. I also know that young [From.GetFirstName] can confirm I was elsewhere when it happened, but [From.GetSheHe] has refused to step forward and confirm my innocence.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is very angry with me for not speaking up in [From.GetHerHis] defence.
Since [From.GetFirstName] refused to defend me, many people think I'm a thief and I have lost prestige at court.
[rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName] is always so annoying. I think [rowdy_events_char_1.GetSheHe] tries to win against me in games just to spite me!
[From.GetFirstName] is angry with me because I am always winning against [From.GetHerHim] in games.
[From.GetFirstName] got angry and told me to get lost!
[From.GetFirstName] went crazy and started a fist fight with me!
[willful_events_char_1.GetFirstName] is frowning at me. 'Waste of time. It will never fit, you've grown out of it.' [willful_events_char_1.GetSheHe] says. But it's my favorite hat!
[From.GetFirstName] insists that I help [From.GetHerHim] get an old hat to fit. A very futile task as [From.GetSheHe]'s too big for it now as I've already told [From.GetHerHim] several times.
[From.GetFirstName] hit me over the head for not listening to [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] thinks I'm mean for not helping. [From.GetSheHeCap] even stuck [From.GetHerHis] tongue out at me.
[brooding_events_char_1.GetTitledName] promised to take me riding today, but when I came to see [brooding_events_char_1.GetHerHim] [brooding_events_char_1.GetSheHe] was drunk and half asleep.

Sure, I forgot about my promise to take [From.GetFirstName] riding. But now... Now [From.GetSheHe] poured water on me when I was resting. I only had a little bit to drink, and and and I am the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle]!

[From.GetFirstName] tried to say something, but I couldn't hear what it was. Then [From.GetSheHeCap] got up and raised [From.GetHerHis] fist at me before stumbling and falling. Now [From.GetSheHe] is snoring.
I have a bad headache, and my episode with [From.GetFirstName] is slowly coming back to me. There is no excuse for my behavior. What's worse is that I even got lectured by a child.
[indolent_events_char_1.GetFirstName] has come to get my help, today we are going to cut down some trees. Very hard work [indolent_events_char_1.GetSheHe] says.
As soon as I came to pick up [From.GetFirstName] to help me out cutting down some trees [From.GetSheHe] starts complaining. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] has a nasty stomach ache.
[From.GetFirstName] spanked me when I complained about my stomach ache. Then [From.GetSheHe] grabbed my arm and told me we were going outside.
[From.GetFirstName] apparently has pains in [From.GetHerHis] arm now after I grabbed it and 'cannot use it to cut trees'.

It has been a long day outside and [playful_events_char_1.GetTitledName] says it is time to head back home. [playful_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap] is carrying some heavy bags, maybe this time I can beat [playful_events_char_1.GetHerHim].

After I told [From.GetFirstName] it was time to head on home, [From.GetSheHe] looked at me with a grin on [From.GetHerHis] face and told me to race [From.GetHerHim] home, leaving me to carry everything on my own.
[From.GetFirstName] chased and caught me. Maybe next time I can run fast enough.
[From.GetFirstName] never seems to be grumpy, always playing without a care in the world.
I saw that the private chambers of [conscientious_events_char_1.GetFullName] were very messy. Papers, books and things lying around everywhere!

As I enter my chambers, all of the work I had done in my spare time seems to have been cleaned up and put back. Books are neatly set in alphabetical order and notes have been thrown away. [From.GetFullName] was apparently 'cleaning' earlier.

[From.GetTitledName] didn't like that I was cleaning [From.GetHerHis] chambers, [From.GetSheHe] could not find important books. Now [From.GetSheHe] messed mine up and said I wasn't allowed back in [From.GetHersHis] anymore.
[From.GetFirstName] is quietly cleaning [From.GetHerHis] chambers after my episode in there. Seems like this is a very thorough child.
It's bedtime but I can't find my favorite toy. I have it when I go to sleep.
[From.GetFirstName] says [From.GetHerHis] favorite toy is missing and [From.GetSheHe] won't go to bed without it. I may have thrown it out today when I was tidying up.
[From.GetFirstName] offered to get me a new toy. [From.GetSheHeCap] said we could go find something nice tomorrow.
My offer to purchase a new toy was rejected by [From.GetFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is upset I would even suggest such a thing.
Today [curious_events_char_1.GetFullName] said [curious_events_char_1.GetSheHe] had to attend to various important matters, and I would have to spend the day alone.
I had told [From.GetFirstName] to stay at home, but just as I finish purchasing my gift to [From.GetHerHim] I turn around and see [From.GetHerHim] trying to hide from me. The surprise is ruined.

[From.GetTitledName] was buying things at the market and [From.GetSheHe] saw me there. Then [From.GetSheHe] pinched my ear and said I should do what I am told. [From.GetSheHeCap] was getting me a treats at the market but now I won't get any!
[From.GetFirstName] didn't react well to my way of correcting [From.GetHerHis] behavior. I fear [From.GetSheHe] is even more suspicious towards me now.
[idolizer_events_char_1.GetTitledName] is so kind to me. And [idolizer_events_char_1.GetSheHe] seems to know so much about everything.
[From.GetFirstName] has written a song in my honor. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] wants me to know that I'm the best person in the world.

[From.GetFirstName] was very happy for my gesture. [From.GetSheHeCap] agreed that [From.GetHerHis] exceptional personality and skill is worthy of songs and praise. Now the others could see [From.GetHerHim] for what [From.GetSheHe] is.
[From.GetFirstName] is no less impressed by me now. It seems I'm quite the idol for [From.GetHerHim].

Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Flipper. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.

As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Flipper staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
Languishing in the dungeon, I suddenly one day hear a small voice calling to me. It seems there is a young child in the cell next to mine...
Walking across the yard, I see [haughty_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName] angrily beating a dog with a heavy stick.
As I'm spending a pleasant moment alone with the attractive cook, young [From.GetFirstName] comes upon us. However, [From.GetSheHe] only winks in complicity and sneaks away.
As I hit [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetTitledFirstName] turned [From.GetHerHis] anger on me but I managed to escape as the dog bit [From.GetHerHim] in the ankle.
As I turned, the dog bit me in the ankle and [From.GetFirstName] managed to get away, but has since been skulking around eyeing me with hatred.

My nannies are away and as I roam around the grounds I come upon [affectionate_events_char_1.GetTitledFirstName]. [affectionate_events_char_1.GetSheHeCap] looks up and seems interested in conversation.
[From.GetFirstName] has really nice toys but [From.GetSheHe] won't share them with me.
I talked for a long while with [From.GetTitledFirstName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] had many funny things to tell me and we had a really good time.
I spoke at length with [From.GetFirstName] about a great many things. We laughed a lot, and it seems I have made a new friend.
[timid_events_char_1.GetFirstName] seems very nice. Maybe I should ask if [timid_events_char_1.GetSheHe] wants to play?

I was strangely and wrongfully accused of stealing fine foods from the personal stores of the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]. However, young [From.GetFirstName] stepped forward to confirm that I was elsewhere at the time and so the suspicions against me were lifted.
[From.GetFirstName] came over and talked to me, asking if I wanted to be friends.
[From.GetFirstName] eventually stepped forward to defend my honor.
There are so many fun things to do, so many forbidden things. I wonder if [rowdy_events_char_1.GetFirstName] would like to join me in some fun pranks?
[From.GetFirstName] seems content to let me win when we play games.
[From.GetFirstName] joined me and we did all kinds of pranks and tricks, everything except summoning [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
[From.GetFirstName] didn't want to play.
Me and [From.GetFirstName] did all kinds of crazy and forbidden things. It was fun!

I'm out playing with [willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] and we're close to the abandoned haunted house, we're not supposed to go there and [willful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is looking frightened.
[From.GetFirstName] really wants to go inside the scary haunted house. It looks like it's dangerous and we have been told not to go near it.
[From.GetFirstName] says we have to go back now, and if we don't [From.GetSheHe] will tell on me.
[From.GetFirstName] says [From.GetSheHe] will get someone else to help [From.GetHerHim].
'Try it again,' [brooding_events_char_2.GetFirstName] says. But I can't do it! I can't whistle.
I woke up feeling a bit hung over, and it's already evening. I vaguely recall [From.GetFirstName] looking at me before I fell asleep. I think I had plans with [From.GetHerHim].
[From.GetFirstName] is quietly mumbling some words and rubbing [From.GetHerHis] face. 'Sorry, I'm sorry' [From.GetSheHe] says..
Waking up in my room, I seem to be missing some money. I vaguely remember [From.GetFirstName] being here. Wasn't [From.GetSheHe]?
I've been asked to go fetch some supplies at the market but it's a long walk. [indolent_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is already going to get other things.
Today me and [From.GetFirstName] spent some time outside cutting down trees, no complaints from the young [From.GetBoyGirl] and work was finished early.
[From.GetFirstName] seemed worried and brought me some tea. I have to drink it to get better. I also got some freshly baked bread for when I feel better.
[From.GetFirstName] was happy when I brought [From.GetHerHim] some tea and bread. [From.GetSheHe] should recover soon.

It's late at night and I get out of bed to use the chamberpot. [playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] starts calling my name and I see a man hiding under the dining table. He notices me and whispers 'psst, come over here'.

After some hours running errands I was heading back home with [From.GetFirstName]. Just as I told [From.GetHerHim] we were going home [From.GetSheHe] took one of the bags to help carry it without me even asking.
[From.GetFirstName] was not happy that I ran away from [From.GetHerHim] without helping. Now I have to stay indoors all day tomorrow.
[From.GetFirstName] was a little bit let down that I caught up with [From.GetHerHim] and even called me a cheater. Not always winning is a good thing for children to learn.
After supper, me and [conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName] were supposed to help do the dishes. But [conscientious_events_char_2.GetFirstName] hid the dirty dishes and wants to go play instead.
After supper, me and [From.GetFirstName] were forced to do dishes. But I was clever and hid them, until [From.GetFirstName] told on me and now I have to do all of it.
[From.GetFirstName] ran away when I told on him. The others said I don't have to do all the work alone. But I was a good [Root.GetBoyGirl] for telling them.
[From.GetFirstName] was very upset with me and told everyone what I did.
Food is on my plate, but steam is coming out of it. I wonder if it's safe to eat? [fussy_events_char_2.GetTitledName] is looking at me.
[From.GetFirstName] was a bit worried about not finding [From.GetHerHis] favorite toy, but seems to have settled down and is now sound asleep.
[From.GetFirstName] finally found my toy after looking for it everywhere. It was in the trash.
[From.GetFirstName] agreed to go get a new toy the next day and finally settled down.
I woke up early and found a sealed letter addressed to [curious_events_char_2.GetTitledName]. I wonder what it could say?
I come back after a day out fetching some things at the market and see [From.GetFirstName] patiently waiting for me like I asked.
I followed [From.GetTitledName] to the market, but then [From.GetSheHe] caught me. [From.GetSheHeCap] laughed and said I was hopeless.
[From.GetFirstName] Seems regretful that [From.GetSheHe] disobeyed me. Hopefully It won't happen again.
Spending time with [idolizer_events_char_2.GetFirstName] is great. We get along so well. Even when we do chores together time goes by so fast.
[From.GetFirstName] told me that everyone is so kind here. [From.GetSheHeCap] would make sure everyone knew how grateful [From.GetSheHe] is.

[From.GetFirstName] was humbled by the song I had written. But [From.GetSheHeCap] wanted to make a point of being just an ordinary person, and that I shouldn't give [From.GetHerHim] more credit than [From.GetSheHe] deserves.
[From.GetFirstName] seems to have lost [From.GetHerHis] overwhelming affection for me. For better or worse, it's good to learn moderation. I might not be that special after all.

Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Cuddles. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.

As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Cuddles staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
Languishing in the dungeon, I suddenly one day hear a voice calling out. It seems there is another child in these dungeons, in the cell next to mine...
Walking outside, I come upon some commoners along the road. One of them calls out, saying I look lovely today.
As I'm beating a rabid dog in the yard, the little cur [From.GetFirstName] runs up and starts hitting me with a stick.
My treatment of that uppity peasant had the unfortunate effect of making more of them angry.
As I am out playing by myself and taking a break to eat some bread I brought from the kitchens, I suddenly notice a young peasant child staring at me. [Root.GetSheHeCap] looks hungry.
Young [From.GetTitledFirstName] just walked up to me today, striking up conversation. We ended up having a long talk, about a great many things.
You shared your bread with the peasant child, and then you played together for several hours before parting ways. [Root.GetSheHeCap] waved happily as [Root.GetSheHe] ran home.
There's a big dinner feast tonight with many prominent people invited, and it has been decided that I shall perform a song in praise of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] for the guests.
[From.GetFirstName] seems to be checking me out, but doesn't come over and talk.

A roar of laughter rolled through the hall when the guests were told that I had hid in a chest in order to avoid having to sing for them. Several of them then called me over and offered me food and candies.
We are playing outside today, and several of the other children are daring me to climb the tallest watchtower.
[From.GetFirstName] excitedly asks me if I wanted to come along and do forbidden things, pranks and the like.
I rapidly climbed up to the top of the tower. But when climbing down again, I slipped. The fall was very painful, but luckily I wasn't very high up.
I've been out fishing for hours. I still haven't caught a fish as big as that servant's child got yesterday.
After a few more hours, I finally feel something bite. It's a huge fish, probably the biggest fish in [Root.Capital.GetName].
[From.GetFirstName] still wants to go, and will lie and say it was my idea unless I go with [From.GetHerHim].
Everyone was busy at home, so I snuck out to the commoners market. When I got there some children were being mean to a smaller child in ragged clothes.
[From.GetFirstName] wanted to learn to whistle. After trying for a while [From.GetSheHe] asked me 'How come you can do it?'
[From.GetFirstName] told me that whistling is easy. That I can do it if I try. But I've tried many times already.
The last thing I remember before falling asleep is apologizing to [From.GetFirstName]. It seems my apology was not what [From.GetSheHe] wanted.
I'm reading a poetry book in my room but the weather is so nice outside. There are some children playing in the sun.
[From.GetFirstName] asked me to get some things for [From.GetHerHim] at the market as I am already going there. [From.GetSheHeCap] is even paying me
[From.GetFirstName] agreed to go get everything if I gave [From.GetHerHim] some extra coin. I should stay in my room so no one knows I'm still home. I've got some time to spend while I'm in here.
Some motivation can give good results, apparently the pain is all gone now after some convincing and [From.GetFirstName] will come join me.
Today I had to help out digging in the garden, but gardening is boring. The gardener is boring too, but maybe?
[playful_events_char_2.GetFirstName] stops calling for me after a while. The man says 'I bet you this gold coin you can't hold your breath until I'm outside'.
Before I knew it, the man was running out through the door. He didn't even look back once.

I heard noises in the middle of the night and when I got up to check on [From.GetFirstName] I had to call out several times. Then [From.GetSheHe] finally answered and I found [From.GetHerHim] under the dining table with a burglar. The guards made quick work of the burglar.
It's getting late but I lost my new vest when I was playing somewhere. If I come back without it everyone will think I'm sloppy!
After supper, me and [From.GetFirstName] had to clean up. But we hid all the dishes where no one could see and now we have been playing all evening.
[From.GetFirstName] was angry with me, but we did finish all the work together. Maybe [From.GetSheHe] doesn't like me any more.
I was invited to the servants' quarters to eat cake with them tonight. But just as I was going there, it started raining.
At the table today, [From.GetFirstName] complained about the food being too hot without even touching it.
[From.GetFirstName] reached over the table and touched my food with [From.GetHerHis] whole hand. [From.GetSheHeCap] said it was not too hot to eat.
I found the toy [From.GetFirstName] was crying about after going through the trash. But now [From.GetSheHe] is not satisfied because it smells.
Suddenly I hear something moving around in the bushes next to me. I ask who's there but there's no response.
I could hear someone sneaking around inside and believed it to be a burglar. When I went downstairs I discovered [From.GetFirstName] opening one of my letters.
[From.GetTitledName] saw me opening the letter and grabbed me by the hand. Then he cut my finger with the paper and said I should keep my nose out of others business.
[From.GetFirstName] seems even more interested in the letter now that [From.GetSheHe] knows it's forbidden.
I have been praying with the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] for a while and some of the other people in the temple are getting ready to leave.
[From.GetFirstName] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] really loves spending time with me. I make [From.GetHerHis] days so much better.
[From.GetFirstName] said that I'm also wonderful to be around. Then [From.GetSheHe] gave me a kiss on the cheek and ran away.
[From.GetFirstName] said that I'm also wonderful to be around. Then [From.GetSheHe] gave me a kiss on the cheek and ran away.

Recently, you notice that there is something wrong with Smelly. [Root.GetSheHeCap] doesn't scurry around and play like [Root.GetSheHe] used to, [Root.GetSheHe] just lies down and moans pitifully, peering at you with [Root.GetHerHis] little beady eyes. [Root.GetSheHeCap] is obviously sick and starving.

As the guards release you from the dungeon, you take one last look back. You see Smelly staring at you intently for a moment, [Root.GetHerHis] little eyes shining strangely in the half-darkness. Then [Root.GetSheHe] scurries away into a corner and out of sight.
As I'm beating a rabid dog in the yard, little [From.GetFirstName] runs up and joins in the beating.
My treatment of that uppity peasant really put him and the others in their place.
Young [From.GetTitledFirstName] just walked up to me today, and as I was about to greet [From.GetHerHim], [From.GetSheHe] just stuck [From.GetHerHis] tongue out and ran away...

You shared your bread with the child and then you played together for a while, until your nannies came and angrily interrupted you. As your friend ran away, the nannies said they'd tell [Educator.GetTitledFirstName] that you had been bad.
[From.GetFirstName] came over to me and said [From.GetSheHe] wanted us to be friends!
The guests were all very offended at my refusal to sing for them.
[From.GetFirstName] asks me if I wanted to play dice.
Agile as a squirrel, I rapidly climbed up the tower and then down again. Everyone was very impressed.
I'm just about to give up, but then it happened. I caught a fish, but it's not very big.
[From.GetFirstName] said I was right and we went back home, away from the scary house.
[From.GetFirstName] asked me to teach [From.GetHerHim] how to whistle. I must have inspired [From.GetHerHim], now [From.GetSheHe] has been at it for hours.
[From.GetFirstName] said that not everyone learns to whistle. Some can never do it.

I wake up, and [From.GetFirstName] is still by my side. [From.GetSheHeCap] has brought me some water to drink, and covered me with a blanket. I don't deserve treatment like this. But if [From.GetSheHe] sees good in me...
[From.GetFirstName] came with me to the market today, we both had to go get some groceries and had time to talk a lot.
[From.GetFirstName] didn't want to help me out. [From.GetSheHeCap] is already heading out.

[From.GetFirstName] was not in [From.GetHerHis] his room and I was starting to get worried. When [From.GetSheHe] finally answered I found [From.GetHerHim] staring at a burglar who was trying to hide from me.
[From.GetFirstName] seemed shocked when [From.GetSheHe] found me. The guards came and took the man hiding under the table. They said he was a bad man and I should stay away from strangers.
I was out too long in the evening, and it hurts when I breathe. The adults say I have to rest a lot.
[From.GetFirstName] was very happy at dinner today, eating with great appetite.
[From.GetFirstName] seemed angry with me and told me to wait until I felt the food's temperature was just right. Now its cool enough.
[From.GetFirstName] finally fell asleep after I found [From.GetHerHis] toy.

I had expected some letters today but couldn't find any. I was suspicious at first but when I asked [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] pointed to a table where they were already sorted for me, untouched.

[From.GetTitledName] came downstairs just as I was opening the letter but [From.GetSheHe] wasn't angry with me. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me it is considered rude to go through other people's belongings.
After talking to [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] seems to understand the concept of privacy better.
[From.GetFirstName] and I always get along well and now [From.GetSheHe] told me that we should stay friends forever.
[From.GetFirstName] seemed a bit uneasy when I told [From.GetHerHim] how I felt. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that it was a nice thing to say, but maybe we should spend less time together.
[From.GetFirstName] seemed a bit uneasy when I told [From.GetHerHim] how I felt. [From.GetSheHeCap] said that it was a nice thing to say, but maybe we should spend less time together.
The bullies all scatter when I tell them to stop. The small child looks at me and asks for food without mentioning the others and what they did. Is this how commoners live?
[From.GetFirstName] seems a bit frustrated by [From.GetHerHis] failed attempts. [From.GetSheHeCap] doesn't seem to respond well to my encouraging words.
The other children are chasing each other, lots of running and jumping.
We had some time to play before we finished all of the work.
Yes! I found my vest and no one will even know it was missing.
I ran very fast and I made it in time. We had lots of fun and the servants seem to like me.
No matter what I do or avoid doing, there seems to be no good way to make [From.GetFirstName] relax. [From.GetSheHeCap] won't eat at all now and I have no more energy to deal with it.
It was a big disgusting rat. It hissed and bit me in the hand and now it hurts, a lot!
After a whole night of religious ritual, I started getting hungry and my mind wandered. Maybe [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] is happy with the time I spent here.
[From.GetFirstName] went back to [From.GetHerHis] room to do other things now.
She was not ticklish, and now she is telling everybody what a hassle I am to have around.
I made it to the servants' quarters, but I got very wet. Then we had a good time and they felt sorry for me having to go out in the cold..
[From.GetFirstName] finally decided to eat [From.GetHerHis] food.
I found an injured bird, it seems to have fallen from its nest. Maybe I can keep it as a pet while it recovers.
It's inappropriate, and I will tell [haughty_events_char_1.GetHerHim]!
I'll catch the brat and give [From.GetHerHim] a good hiding!
The [GetRootFromInsult]! I will tell everyone!
I could let [affectionate_events_char_1.GetHerHim] play with them.
Yes, that would be nice!

I've gotten an increased amount of questions from [From.GetFirstName] lately about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and the rituals of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.

Over the past weeks I've grown more and more curious about the beliefs and rituals of my [GetFromRelation]. Today [From.GetSheHe] finally began to answer my repeated questions about [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Your [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName] has, through the teachings of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], been studying the principles of the [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] faith

During the past few months, [From.GetFirstName] has shown dogged determination in [From.GetHerHis] studies of our language and has now also expressed a desire to study the history of my people's ancestors.
Pleased with the progress I'm making with learning the local language, [From.GetFirstName] has brought me a book about the ancestry of the [From.Culture.GetName] people.

Rumor has it that your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has been influenced by [From.GetHerHis] guardian's splendor. It is said that [From.GetFirstName] is now considered properly [From.Culture.GetName].

To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

I write to ask for your permission to give my ward, [From.GetFirstName], a proper [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] upbringing.

Signed [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
Dear [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],\n\nYour initiative to teach [FromFrom.GetFirstName] about Heritage is most welcome.

To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

I write to ask for your permission to give my ward, [From.GetFirstName], a proper [FromFrom.Religion.GetName] upbringing and learn the ways of [FromFrom.Religion.GetScriptureName].

Signed [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
Dear [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],\n\nYour initiative to teach [FromFrom.GetFirstName] about your religion is most welcome and I accept your proposal.

Dear, [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetFirstName].\n\nWhile I admire your enthusiasm for the upbringing of [FromFrom.GetFirstName] I do believe that it's best to continue with the current plan of education for [FromFrom.GetHerHim].

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nClearly you can understand what an outlandish suggestion you are making. [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is supposed to grow up to be a fine and cultured [FromFrom.GetManWoman], something which will obviously not be possible with your strange rituals and repulsive manners.

To the [GetFromRootInsult] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],\n\nI am certain you can understand what a blasphemous suggestion you are making! [FromFrom.GetFirstName] is supposed to grow up to be a fine and dutiful [FromFrom.GetManWoman], something which will obviously not be possible with your strange rituals and profane manners.
